actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prevent the financing of the terrorist activities of the regimes of Iran and Libya through the purchase of oil for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
short_title: Anti Terrorist Petroleum Acquisition Act of 1982

summary.text: Anti-Terrorist Petroleum Acquisition Act of 1982 - Declares that the purpose of this Act is to prevent efforts to fill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve from resulting in financing Iranian and Libyan Terrorism. Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to prohibit the acquisition of Iranian or Libyan petroleum for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

titles.title: Anti Terrorist Petroleum Acquisition Act of 1982
A bill to prevent the financing of the terrorist activities of the regimes of Iran and Libya through the purchase of oil for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
